jec.title: Offensive Hacking & Cyber Awareness
jec.Short Description: A 2-hour practical workshop on real-world offensive hacking and cyber hygiene.
jec.Description: For successfully completing the 2-hour live training on Offensive Hacking & Cyber Awareness organized by CappricioSec University. Topics covered included: Mobile Hacking and Spyware, Webcam Hacking, Drone Security, IVR Scams, and Cyber Hygiene. This workshop empowers participants with hands-on knowledge to identify and defend against modern cyber threats in everyday life.
PREREQUISITES: Willingness to learn and protect oneself online
What you'll learn: Real-life Mobile Hacking Techniques and Spyware Detection
Webcam Hacking Risks and How to Prevent Them
IVR Scam Awareness and How to Stay Safe
Protecting Yourself in the Digital Age
